MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Queens Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 05:06am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 06:58am on the 29th of January 2021
